nodes.text: Former Jedi Knight Zayne Carrick owned a lightsaber that replaced the weapon he originally bore during his membership with the Jedi Order. His new lightsaber produced a blue blade, different from the yellow shine of its predecessor, and was etched with the names of his former classmates; the victims of the Padawan Massacre of Taris. The lightsaber's crystal was formed by fusing the deceased padawan's crystals together.
